direction.raw_text: I don't know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!  You stay here. Eric runs upstairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - LOBBY - DAY Francois is on the ground holding his arm.  He keeps rolling back and forth in pain. Ricardo is dead. Jean, Claude, and Oliver are waving their guns around ready to kill someone any second.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Nobody fucking moves!  Nobody fucking moves!] Claude motions to the dead security guard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [The gun!  Somebody get it!] Oliver goes over to the dead security guard, the whole time waving his gun at people.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Don't fuck with me!  Don't fuck with me!] He grabs the gun from the dead security guards limp grip. Eric storms in.  He isn't wearing his mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [What the fuck is going on!?] Zoey notices Eric, she remembers him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [This crazy fuck shot Ricardo!] Eric looks over at Ricardo and then at the carnage. Then everybody notices he isn't wearing a mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Eric, your mask.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh shit. Then Oliver yanks his off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who gives a damn if they see us or not anyway!  I can't see a fucking think in this! Everyone takes their masks off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Is this what happens?  Is this what happens when I walk away for five minutes?]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [He had a hidden gun.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [He had a hidden gun.] (then back to normal) [I don't care!] Then, one of the bank customers, a MALE TOURIST, speaks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is insane!  I am a U.S. citizen! You must let me go! Eric looks at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm an American!  American!  I'm just here exchanging dollars.  If it wasn't for my country you'd all be speaking German! Eric is tired of this outburst, he shoots him. Everyone screams.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [I have had enough of this nonsense!  The next person that speaks will die!] Everyone is quiet. Francois is sitting on the floor bleeding from his arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Eric, I'm sorry.  Things got out of hand.  But we're in control now.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Good.  Let's try to keep it that way. God what a mess.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eric
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [What the fuck is it now!?  You want me to hold your hand as you take a piss?]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [I have a question.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [What?]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Do we know if the alarm went off or not?]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Yes.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [We do?]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Yes.  It didn't go off.  If it had the police would be here and our whole plan would be fucked.  But they're not here, and our plan isn't fucked.  So if there aren't any more fucking stupid questions I'll go downstairs and see if we're in yet.  Is that okay with you?] Claude nods. Then, the phone rings. Everyone looks at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [I thought the phones were dead.] It rings again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The phones are dead. Eric grabs a WOMAN TELLER who is crying hysterically and lifts her to her feet. He drags her to the ringing phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Answer it!] She is crying too hard. Eric puts his gun to her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Answer it or you will die.] She slowly picks up the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Banque Internationale de Paris. She pauses, then hands the phone to Eric.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [It's for you.] Eric takes the phone and pushes her to the floor. He puts the receiver to his ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Hello.] (pause) [Who is this?] Eric motions to Oliver to check the windows. Oliver runs over and peeks out the blinds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh my God!  The police!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [What do you want?] Eric looks around at the dead bodies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [We're all fine in here.] Oliver is pacing back and forth wildly.  He starts loading extra ammo into his weapon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [No.  I'll tell you what, you go fuck yourself you fucking pig.  You send anyone near this building and I'll kill the first person I lay my hands on.  I've got plenty hostages here to kill so don't even think of coming in.] (pause) [Just stay put.  We'll call you when we're ready.  In the mean time, have a nice day.] Eric hangs up the phone, and then leaves it off the hook.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [The silent alarm must have gone off after all!]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Shut the fuck up!  The alarm didn't do shit.  For all we know your idiot shooting brought them here.  Anyhow it doesn't matter.  Nothing has changed.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [My God!  The police!  What are we going to do?]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Nothing.  We don't have to do anything. The plan stays the same, just slightly different.] Then Eric catches sight of Zoey, their eyes lock.  Eric smiles and winks.  Then he turns to Jean with a whisper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [If the police decide to come in...kill them.  And if you don't mind, stack those bodies somewhere else.  This place is a fucking mess and it's bad for morale.] Then he takes off downstairs, smiling.  Jean is a little stumped. INT. BANK - RESERVE VAULT AREA - DAY As Eric walks down the stairs and through the reserve vault area a look of intense concentration washes over his face. You can see that a trillion calculations are being made in his brain...the question is:  are there any answers?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - VAULT ANTECHAMBER - DAY Zed is drilling now with a hand drill.  He removes it and blows into the hole.  Shavings come out. Eric comes trotting into the antechamber whistling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's going on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing.  They were just scaring them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, did you tell them to stay quiet?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.  They're assholes.  Just having fun. Zed looks into the hole. He has drilled into the vault door, revealing some wiring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fucked up my drill bit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay.  You can buy another one. Zed takes out a volt meter from his briefcase and inserts the two prongs into the hole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cross your fingers. Eric does. The volt meter's needle jumps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perfect.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excellent.  What next?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We find the fuse box.  It'll probably be upstairs. Zed gets up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay.  I'll find it for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.  I need to see it myself. Zed jumps up and into the storage/elevator area with Eric close behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think it would be better if I looked for you.  I could-- INT. BANK - STORAGE/ELEVATOR AREA - DAY Instead of walking upstairs, Zed finds the fuse box right in the next room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold on.  Here she is. Eric is a bit relieved. Zed opens it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's see. He looks through the fuses and then finds the one he wants.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, you throw this fuse switch off and then back on when I call to you.  Any other switch may set off the alarm. Eric smirks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I wouldn't want to do that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Got it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Got it. Zed goes back to the vaults. INT. BANK - VAULT ANTECHAMBER - DAY Zed trots back to the Poseidon vault door and quickly grabs a little gizmo from out of his briefcase.  It is a little home- made black box with a series of LED's on it and two wires coming out of one side with alligator clips on the end. Three other wires are also coming out of it. He slips the alligator clips into the hole and latches them. He then tapes one of the wires to the vault itself. The two remaining wires he hooks up to a large twelve volt battery.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on sweetie don't fail me now. He looks toward the door leading to the reserve vault area.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ready?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ready! Zed turns on his little box, the LED's start flickering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now! The lights go out and then back on. There is a whirring sound from the vault door. The LED's quickly go from red to green. There is a loud, heavy clicking as the vault door unlocks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Open seasame. Zed smiles and swings the door open revealing the interior of the Poseidon vault. Eric comes running in like a kid on Christmas morning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It worked! He and Zed hug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh my God it worked! Zed looks into the Poseidon vault at the passage connecting it to the main vault.  It is covered by a small locked cage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can get through that lock in a minute.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then do it.  We don't have all day. Zed enters the Poseidon vault. INT. BANK - POSEIDON VAULT - DAY Zed goes to the gated passage which isn't much more than a window in one upper side of the vault, but it's enough to get him into the main vault. Eric is right behind him. Zed takes a twirl at the combination lock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dime store brand.  Three minutes max.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. Then, there's a gunshot.  The bullet comes from the Calibre vault through the window and almost hits Zed. Zed falls backwards onto the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Merde! Then there's another gunshot. The bullet ricochets through the vault.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus Christ! Scrambling on their hands and knees Zed and Eric crawl out of the Poseidon vault. INT. BANK - VAULT ANTECHAMBER - DAY They take cover. Another shot is fired into the vault. Zed and Eric look into the vault.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Another security guard?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Must be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think I stained my pants.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me too. Oliver comes running in with his gun ready for action.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it?!  I came down to see how things were going and heard shots!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Some asshole in the vault. Oliver takes cover and cocks his gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've got guns.  Why don't we just storm in and blast his fucking ass!  It's three against one!  Let's give it the old--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quiet!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm just trying to be helpful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just let me think.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't have to snap at me. Eric peeks into the vault.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Hey you.  Nice shooting.  Play time's over.  Why don't you throw out your gun?]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Oliver and Eric look at each other and smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Come on.  We don't want to kill you.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [You'll have to!]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is this guys problem? (then to the guard) [Come on!  You're making me impatient.  I don't have all day.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Look, don't take it personally.  This is my job.] Oliver and Eric look at each other and shrug.  Then Eric sees something in Zed's briefcase.  It looks like grey clay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Then take a paid vacation.  We won't tell if you won't.] There is a pause.  During this time Eric takes the clay and pushes a detonator into it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the Hell are you doing?  Have you gone mad?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Sorry.  I can't.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Well, look, we're going to give you fifteen minutes to change your mind. Okay?]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Okay.] Zed starts to grab the plastique away from Eric.  Eric resists.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's too much.  It's dangerous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I like danger. (then to the guard) [Changed your mind yet?] Eric creeps into the room and activates the detonator. Zed and Oliver run for cover.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [No.  And I'm not going to.  Why don't you just take the money from the other vaults?--] Eric tosses the bar of plastique through the caged window and makes a break for it. There is a huge explosion in the adjoining main vault.  The walls quake and a fireball bellows out of the caged window, blowing it open. The vault guard #1 screams and then goes silent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - LOBBY - DAY Francois, Claude, and Jean are forcing customers to drag dead bodies into a cube.  The room shakes and everyone looks toward the hall that leads to the stairs. The hostages, whose nerves are already shot, start crying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Should we see if they're okay?]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [No.  They're just blasting the vault open.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [What does it matter now?  We're fucking surrounded by police.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - VAULT ANTECHAMBER - DAY Dust has blown out of the vault and is settling on Oliver, Zed, and Eric, who is laughing like a madman. Zed is looking at him like he's crazy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You asshole!  You could have killed us all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I didn't!  Let's go check out the damage. Eric gets up and walks into the Poseidon vault. Before Zed follows him he looks at Oliver who doesn't know what to think. INT. BANK - POSEIDON VAULT - DAY Eric laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zed look! He points to the caged window.  It's been blown off it's hinges.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I beat you!  I opened it in under three minutes. He starts laughing and then crawls through the connecting passage into the Caliber vault. Zed, with his briefcase, follows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go around and wait at the main vault door.  When I tell you, open it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right.  When you tell me, I'll open it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right. Zed crawls through the opening.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be at the other vault waiting for you to call to me. INT. CALIBER VAULT - DAY The main vault looks like what a vault would look like if it were blown up from the inside.  On the floor is the still smoldering body of the security guard.  The room is incredibly smokey. Zed squeezes through the opening. Then, Eric, grinning like a schoolboy, emerges from the smoke with a brick sized bar of pure gold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at it!  We're all rich! The smoke clears and we see that on the far side of the vault there is a huge platen on wheels with bricks of gold stacked onto it. Eric starts laughing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're rich! Zed looks at him like he's crazy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're rich!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're not out of here yet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes but we're rich! Zed takes a seat at the vault door.  The backside of a vault door looks like an incredibly intricate clock.  Zed removes the Plexiglass shielding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to show the others. He squirms out of the entry with the brick of gold. Zed shakes his head and goes to work setting dials and using his voltmeter to test electrical points.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - LOBBY - DAY Claude is talking to Jean.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [What?  You think we may actually get out of this?  You're fooling yourself.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Why are you such a pessimist?]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Are you kidding me?  Look at this mess.] Jean surveys the mess, the crying people.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [This is nothing.  Imagine the police outside.  We're dead men.] Eric walks in from the rear stairs.  In his hand is a brick of gold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Jean, Francois, Claude...look at this.] They see the gold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [You did it!  You got in!]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Zed is opening the vault now.  This is a taste.] Eric holds the bar of gold up for all the people to see.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Look at this and tell me I'm not brilliant.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [You're a monster!  And you'll never leave this place alive!] Eric shoots her with his Uzi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [None of you are worth half of this single bar.  Remember that.] Francois, Jean, and Claude look at each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Eric...can I speak with you?]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Of course.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [In private.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [There's no need.  I have nothing to hide.  What is it Claude?]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Well...we're surrounded by the police and we have no way out.  What are we going to do?] Eric slaps him across the face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [What are you doing Claude?  Talking of all this false doubt.  What do you think we're going to do?] Claude is hurt, not physically but emotionally.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [I don't know...not the original plan.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Obviously, since Ricardo fucked us up and didn't kill the concierge fast enough.  And killing all these assholes-- ] (motioning to all the customers) [--isn't going to do us a damn bit of good now, is it?]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [No.  Because we'll need them as hostages when we get on the plane.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [We're going on a plane?] Eric pats his shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Claude, you are a mental giant.  Leave the plans up to me and just kill people if they get out of line, okay?]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Okay.] Eric turns and starts to walk toward the downstairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [I'm going to see how things are going.] INT. BANK - REAR STAIRS TO LOBBY - DAY Eric is whistling while he walks, he pauses to perform a quick magic trick, then he continues. INT. RESERVE VAULT AREA - DAY Eric walks into the reserve vault area. He stops.  He hears something.  A scratching sound. He looks at it's source, TWO POLICEMEN, decked out in black flak jackets and gas masks are starting to come out of a sewer manhole. Eric's eyes widen.  He takes his silencer out of his coat and fixes it to his handgun.  Then, like a man with intent to kill, he rapidly approaches them. The one who came out of the manhole turns just in time to see Eric fire into his chest.  Then, Eric aims the gun into the tight crawlspace and fires into the other man.  For safe measure he empties his gun into the tiny causeway. He drops the gun into the hole and then shoves the other policeman into it.  He then pushes a large utility wagon over the manhole cover to stop anyone else from coming in. INT. BANK - REAR STAIRS TO LOBBY - DAY Eric comes running out from the reserve vault area and up the stairs to the lobby. INT. BANK - LOBBY - DAY Eric rushes into the lobby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [They want to fuck with me!?  They want to fuck with me!?] He puts the phone on the hook. It instantly rings. He answers the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [You want to fuck with me!?  I'll show you what happens to people who fuck with me!] He throws the phone to the ground and looks at Zoey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [The moment of truth my love.  You knew it would come.] He grabs Zoey and lifts her to her feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Then, the assistant manager stops him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [No!  What ever it is you're going to do have mercy!] Eric suddenly calms down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Have mercy?]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Yes.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [With her.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Yes.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [That's sweet.] (to Zoey) [You have quite a reach my lovely.  Is he one of your clients?] He pushes Zoey to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [It's a deal.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Thank you.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Don't mention it.] He grabs the assistant manager and at gunpoint forces him to the main entrance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Eric!  What are you doing?]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Clearing up the "how full of shit am I" question the cops are asking themselves right now.] The assistant manager is putting up a bit of a struggle but Eric simply forces him along. Everyone waits until suddenly they hear a burst of gunfire from outside.  They all scream. Eric walks back into the bank, he picks up the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Hello.] (pause) [Yes.  I'll hold.] (then to Claude) [I'm holding.] After a little bit of a wait someone comes on the other end of the line.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Hello.] (pause) [You don't know the fucking half of it. So just shut the fuck up and listen.  Try any more stunts and I'll fucking really go crazy.] (pause) [Well that's good because if you faggot cops even think of it I'll kill some more people.  Hear?] (pause) [No.  None of that.  We won't trade. That never works.  Not in the movies, not in real life.  Understand?  We're going to get into our van, with a couple of people, go to the airport, and fly out of this shit hole city.  And you're not going to follow us.] (pause) [Who do you fucking think is going to supply the plane?  Us?  No, you fucking imbecile, the French taxpayers would be a good second guess for you.  You're really pissing me off.  You think I'm a fucking amature?] He covers the mouth piece.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [I fucking hate cops.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - CALIBER VAULT - DAY Zed is sweating as he works away at the back of the door.  He glances over what he's done and makes a calculation on a calculator. Then, there is a groaning sound. Zed, terrified, spins around. Another groaning sound.  The vault security guard isn't dead. His body is charred and he's not moving but he's very much alive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [I'm going to die...] Zed can't believe what he's seeing. He moves over to the body, leaving his work behind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [I'm going to die...please hold my...hand.  I don't...want to die...alone.] Zed hovers over the body, afraid to touch it.  He gives it a nudge with his foot. The body groans and then exhales the longest exhale ever. Zed kneels down next to the body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you still there? Nothing. Zed puts his hand to the neck of the vault guard #1 and checks for a pulse. Nothing. Zed sits there for a moment looking at the corpse, then, like he wants to get out of there as soon as possible, he scrambles to the door and starts adjusting several switches. He has wired a battery to two leads.  He takes out a wire cutter and snips a wire. There is a sudden barrage of whirring and clicking sounds as the vault unlocks. Zed calls to Oliver from the passage. INT. BANK - STORAGE/ELEVATOR AREA - DAY Oliver is staring at the dead bodies of the manager and sub lobby teller.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oliver, now!  Open the vault! Oliver turns the large wheel and opens the Caliber vault door. With some amount of energy the door opens.  Standing inside is Zed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Open seasame. He steps out of the vault.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you want to give me a hand?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure. Oliver puts his gun down and they go into the Calibre vault. INT. BANK - CALIBER VAULT - DAY Oliver sees the huge platen of gold bricks.  Zed puts his steel briefcase on top of it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Holy mother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here, help me with this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - LOBBY - DAY Eric slams the phone down and then in a fit of rage tears the phone from the wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Merde! He grabs his machine gun and aims it at the sub lobby guard #2. The sub lobby guard #2 braces himself for gunfire. Eric fires into him.  He is dead instantly. Everybody screams. Eric fires into his dead corpse until his gun runs out of bullets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [That's what you get!] Claude puts his hand on Eric's shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eric. Eric looks at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [The fucking police won't budge.  I kill a man and they don't care.  They say they don't make deals with terrorists.  It really fucks up my plan.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [And what if we gave up?] Eric can't believe this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Claude, look around you.  We're not talking prison here.  You know.  The cops will give in.  You start killing women...they give in.  They're all so fucking much in love with women!] Then he looks at Zoey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [What are you looking at you fucking whore?] She doesn't want to say a thing that'll upset him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Are you afraid I'll tell these people that this is only a day job for you?] She shakes her head "no".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [What?  So they know that you're a--] The sub lobby assistant speaks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Leave her alone.] Eric cracks the butt of his gun into the man's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Shut up!] He clicks another clip into the Uzi and grabs Zoey by the collar and lifts her to her feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [My only mistake was not to make an example of a woman to begin with.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - CALIBER VAULT - DAY Zed takes the dolly and starts wheeling the platen of gold out.  Oliver helps him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is unbelievable.  Look at all of this.  It's wonderful to touch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just help me steer this out. They maneuver out of the Calibre vault. INT. BANK - STORAGE/ELEVATOR AREA - DAY They come out of the Calibre vault with the huge platen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you think we should get some cash also?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What for?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, you never know. They start maneuvering the platen toward an elevator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Money is too easily traceable.  You'd never be able to spend it.  And forget about exchanging it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's true.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No sir.  Your best bet is to get these bars melted down in Tunisia or Korea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eric knows someone in Portugal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or Portugal. They get into the banks private freight elevator. INT. BANK - FREIGHT ELEVATOR - DAY Zed closes the door and pushes the button to go up to the ground floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - LOBBY - DAY Eric is dragging Zoey by the hair toward the door when she grabs his groin and starts squeezing. Eric lets out a shrill scream and whacks the butt of the Uzi into her face. But she won't let go.  Her years as a prostitute have taught her to ignore pain. She grabs hold of the gun hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [You fucking bitch!] A few bursts of the Uzi go off and one shell stitches Eric's foot red. Eric lets go and falls to the ground. Claude, Jean, and Francois suddenly become attentive to what's going on. Zoey starts firing the Uzi but can't control it.  She showers the room with bullets.  She starts to run toward the back office blindly firing the gun in the direction of Claude, Eric, Francois, Jean, and the other hostages. Then, a tear gas cannister break through the top windows and start clouding the place up. Eric whips out his switch blade and hops on his bloody red foot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Bitch!]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - FREIGHT ELEVATOR - DAY Zed is waiting for the elevator to arrive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do we have a covering of some kind?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know.  Something to cover this with. It'll look kind of conspicuous leaving the bank with a platten of gold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, it won't matter.  The police know what we're up too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Police?!  What do you mean they know what we're up too?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't know?  We've been discovered. But Eric has them under control. Zed is frantic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No I didn't know!  How many police?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The building is surrounded. The elevator doors open onto the ground floor to the sound of automatic gunfire.  Zed walks out into the back office. INT. BANK - BACK OFFICE - DAY Suddenly, from the back office, Zed sees Zoey blasting away an Uzi and running toward the rear stairwell.  Eric is in the lobby limping around.  The other gang members are ducking from her fire. Then, her clip runs out. She sees Zed, their eyes lock.  An IMAGE overcomes Zed.  She runs down the stairs to the back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kill her!  Kill her! Oliver aims his gun to fire and Zed pushes it up.  Oliver's gun discharges into the ceiling.  Oliver and Zed begin to struggle. INT. BANK - LOBBY - DAY Zed and Oliver collapse out of the back office and into the lobby.  They tumble onto the floor.  Eric hobbles over to them, his gun aimed at Zed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the fuck are you doing!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - RESERVE VAULT AREA - DAY Zoe is near tears.  She drops the empty machine gun to the floor and starts walking toward the sub lobby. CUT TO: INT. BANK - LOBBY - DAY Eric leans down to talk to Zed.  Oliver and Jean are watching.  Francois and Claude are more worried about the tear gas.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [They're trying to smoke us out Eric!]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [What do we do!?] Eric waves them off with a brush of his hand.  He's concentrating on Zed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you really love your bitch whore girlfriend that much?  She's really fucked with your mind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eric...what are you talking about? Eric lifts him to his feet and holds him up against the knife.  He turns him toward the smoke and whispers into his ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at it.  It's all for us.  The smoke. The attention.  They have no idea of who they're dealing with.  They have no idea what kind of men we are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What kind of men are we? Eric looks at him and gives him a soft kiss on the cheek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can no longer be in our club.  You forfeit your cut of the pie. Zed laughs, there's not gonna be much of a pie to eat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about our friendship?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit Zed.  I haven't seen you in years. You hardly know me. He slashes Zed across the face with the switchblade.  Zed falls backwards and tumbles down the stairs like a rag doll.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never let a girl come between two men. He walks down the hall toward the gold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now let's try to get out of here. Eric walks into the back office.  The others look at each other. Suddenly a black figure runs across the bank behind the shadows, Francois sees it and nervously fires. In the background the distinctive sound of European police sirens wail as more cars pull up to the outside of the bank. Also, an UNINTELLIGIBLE VOICE is blaring orders over a bullhorn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [The police!  They're entering the building!] Suddenly all of them start firing like blindly into the smoke. Francois runs back to Eric who has walked up to the elevator via the back office. INT. BANK - FREIGHT ELEVATOR - DAY Eric caresses his hand across the bars of gold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Smoother and more giving than the most selfless human being.  You're beautiful.] Francois runs in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Eric!]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Jesus, what now?]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [The police are coming in!  We're doomed!]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Get a hostage.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [They don't give a fuck about the hostages!]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - LOBBY - DAY Jean becomes a berzerker and runs out into a cloud of smoke and throws the tear gas container into the thick cloud. Then he turns to the police and holds his own gun to his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Don't make me!] A single bullet passes through his torso.  As Jean falls to the ground he lets loose a round of gunfire into the ceiling. Oliver is still firing, his face is red like a crazed man. From behind the counter the sub lobby assistant grabs a hold of Claude and wrestles him to the ground. The other customers start to flee for cover. Oliver sees the fracas between the sub lobby assistant and Claude.  It looks like the sub lobby assistant is getting the upper hand.  Oliver swings his gun around and sprays machine gun fire at them...killing them both.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - SUB LOBBY - DAY Zoe walks up the stairs out, not only are they locked but a cloud of tear gas is pouring into the downstairs sub lobby. Suddenly, Zed stumbles in. Zed is like a zombie.  Then he notices Zoe in the stairwell. They lock eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zoe... She steps down into the sub lobby, machine guns crackle in the background.  She runs up to him just as he slumps to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My Zed.  They've hurt you. She dabs a cloth to his cut face.  He holds it on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're going to be okay.  In many countries scars on the face are a symbol of heroism.  To proudly display a flaw like a badge...is to wear a badge of truth. He takes her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be serious Zoe...I can stick my tongue through my cheek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - LOBBY - DAY The police are now laying it on heavy.  Francois comes out of the office.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oliver!  Let's get a hostage!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is the end! Francois is ripped into by machine gun fire. Oliver races past him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - SUB LOBBY - DAY Tear gas is starting to fill the room. Zoe stands Zed up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen to me.  We're going to lock ourselves into one of the air tight vaults...if any of them are still open. They start walking toward the reserve vault area.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - FREIGHT ELEVATOR - DAY Eric hops into the elevator and closes the door, just as Oliver runs up, firing toward the police. Eric is laughing manically as he leaves them behind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bastard! Oliver turns to where the police will surely be coming in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - RESERVE VAULT AREA - DAY Zoey and Zed rush into the reserve vault area.  Zoey notices that the downstairs reserve vault is closed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Merde!  The vault has been closed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about the others? The gunfire upstairs has subsided and has been replaced by unintelligible POLICE VOICES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen...there's no gunfire. Zoey quietly opens the door opposite the vault that leads to the rear stairs to the lobby level. INT. BANK - REAR STAIRS TO LOBBY - DAY Zoey peeks up the stairs just in time to see Oliver bolt for the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Motherfuckers! A volly of gunfire rips into Oliver but he stands his ground and fires into the police.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You wanna fuck with me?  You wanna fuck with me?  I'll show you who you're fucking with! He starts blasting away. Terrified, Zoey leads Zed to the storage/elevator area.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, we'll be safer in here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - STORAGE/ELEVATOR AREA - DAY The elevator door opens, Eric steps out and looks around like a caged animal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Think!] Then, Zed and Zoey appear from the hall to the reserve vault area. Eric turns to them with his gun raised, when he sees them he lowers it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zed. They all stand there for a moment, the gunfire cracking away upstairs.  Eric is more casual than he should be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's your girlfriends name?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zoe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zoe. (to Zoey in French) [Zoe, come here to me.] Zoey spits at him. Eric laughs and aims the gun at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Killing you would just be gravy, so don't fuck with me.]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Go ahead you slob.  Shave my ass!] Eric smashes the side of her face with the gun and then grabs a hold of her arm. Zed tries to stop Eric but Eric aims the gun at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zed no.  I'll kill you.  It means nothing to me, our friendship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eric...there's no fucking way out of here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh but you're wrong.  This is my way out. This dime store couge with her motor driven ass.  You find your own. Zed rushes Eric and Zoey starts scratching.  Eric drops the gun but quickly whips out his knife. She tries to get away from Eric but he has a hold on her shirt. Eric swipes at her with the knife and grazes he back. Then Eric slashes toward Zed who jumps back. Zoey falls to the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come Zed...I'm going to cut you like a sausage. Zed is standing between Zoey and Eric.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zoey, get out of here! She scrambles away. He swipes at Zed. Zed jumps back down the hall toward the reserve vault area. INT. BANK - RESERVE VAULT AREA- DAY They rush out toward the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you see how she ran?  Did you see how she ran?  She doesn't care about you. Fucking pussy only cares about pussy. Look out for number one.  What do you say Zed? He swipes again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will kill you.  And once I kill you Zed, I'll get out of here.  I'll fuck your bitch up the ass and give her AIDS...if she doesn't already have it. What do you say to that Zed? He swipes and Zed grabs a hold of the knife by the blade. Eric pulls it free and the knife falls to the floor. Zed takes this opportunity and kicks Eric in the face. Eric reaches for the knife. Zed, his hand bloody, dives onto Eric. Zoey also jumps onto them and starts yanking on Eric's hair. She plunges her nails into his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fucking bitch! Zed is rabbit punching Eric from underneath. Then, Eric grabs a hold of Zed's balls and squeezes. Zed lets out a shrill scream. Eric starts elbowing Zoey in the face. The three of them lay there on the floor wriggling like worms, unable to move because each is putting the other through such agony. Then, Oliver, shot up and bloody haplessly stumbles into the room.  His body is a mass of bullet wounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ox!  Where is thy yoke!? He clumsily falls dead to the ground, his shotgun slides near Zoey, Zed, and Eric. The sight of the gun gives Eric the strength only a madman could posses.  He rolls over and throws Zoey off him. Then, he smashes his forehead into Zed's nose, bursting it. Eric, deftly, rolls over and grabs the gun. He gets to his feet and cocks the pump action.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck both of you. Then he notices the lack of gunfire upstairs. Eric turns back to them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Au revoir. He aims to kill Zed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Then, all of the French policemen, decked out in their assault gear and wearing gas masks, storm down the stairs. At the sight of Eric about to execute Zed they raise their guns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Stop!] Eric stops. It becomes quiet. Then, Eric looks back down at Zed and braces for the shotgun kick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I give you little kiss.  Ciao. He squeezes the trigger and... CLICK The police open fire with their French made assault machine guns and fill Eric with bullets.  Instead of falling he does a scarecrow dance as his body is painted red. The wall behind them explodes as plaster sprays all over Zed. An IMAGE overcomes Eric. Eric's dead body slumps to it's knees and flops on top of Zed. Zed pushes the body off and tries to drag himself to Zoey. Zoey runs up to him and holds him. The police all charge into the secondary vault area and secure the downstairs. Zoey is crying as she holds Zed. The police have their guns aimed at the two of them. Zoey looks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [I work here.  This man is a customer...he needs medical help.] They take their guns away and kneel next to him, seeing if he's okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [How bad do you think his wounds are?] The other policeman, unable to tell because of Eric's blood, simply shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [Are you alright?] Zoey starts to cry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BANK - LOBBY - DAY Zoey and Zed, bandaged up, are being aided by all of the French policemen as they walk through the bank. Smoke is still clearing, but the bodies of customers and bank robbers alike litter the area. PARAMEDIC's, wearing all white, try to help the injured, they assist Zed and Zoey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [There's an ambulance outside.] (he looks around) [My God.  What a Bastille Day.] Zed's attention is caught by two OTHER POLICEMEN carrying a body bag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [This one's the ringmaster.  We need an I.D.] No longer interested in Zoey or Zed, he goes to check out the body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The hospital?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on.  I have a car. Zoey puts her arm around Zed and helps him out of the bank...never to return.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (starting out calm and then building to a scream)
dialogue.name: dialogue
